name: Low-level potion
description: This potion is made from an unknown fruit, but it heals slightly.

name: Potion
description: This potion is produced by an alchemist using standardized methods.

name: Good potion
description: This potion is crafted by renowned alchemists.

name: High-level potion
description: This potion is crafted by legendary alchemists and can be dropped by bosses.

name: Holy potion
description: A potion that cures all maladies.
